channel.title: Xp to Vista Easily! Just 1 simple download
channel.description:
Disclaimer: I take no responsibility to what happens to your computer's.
You can download the theme and install it here http://www.crystalxp.net/galerie/en.id.130.htm
You can read the system requirments at www.crystalxp.net All the way at the bottom of the page.
Have fun :)
Im pretty sure this is virus free but just 4 all u to make go here and scan it http://virusscan.jotti.org/
Rember to like that sleek new look. This is wat should come out (You pick your language in begining installation i think)\
[img]http://www.crystalxp.net/galerie/img/img-shell-packs-bricopack-vista-inspirat-ultimate-2-dlb-130.jpg[/img]
Pretty cool
Disclaimer: I take no responsibility to what happens to your computer's. ^ This is to rember
